mapper.sql: id, model, offtime, endtime, airport, duration, transit, fprice, time, startcity, endcity
mapper.select: select f.id, f.model, f.offtime, f.endtime, f.airport, f.duration, f.transit, f.fprice from flight as f LEFT JOIN website as w on f.id = w.fid
select w.ticket, w.price from flight as f LEFT JOIN website as w on f.id = w.fid where f.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into flight (model, offtime, endtime, airport, duration, transit, fprice, time, startcity, endcity) values (#{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offtime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{airport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=DATE}, #{startcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

model,

mapper.update:
update flight
model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
offtime = #{offtime,jdbcType=TIME},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIME},
airport = #{airport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
duration = #{duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transit = #{transit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fprice = #{fprice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
time = #{time,jdbcType=DATE},
startcity = #{startcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endcity = #{endcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update flight set model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, offtime = #{offtime,jdbcType=TIME}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIME}, airport = #{airport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transit = #{transit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fprice = #{fprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time = #{time,jdbcType=DATE}, startcity = #{startcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endcity = #{endcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
